reviews.review_msg: Young pretentious self-important guy. Claimed to be techno-crack but more like wanne-be. Picky in minor stuff and lack imgination. Though he is new and young, his thinking is so "yester-years". Avoid him if you want real education.

I LOVED this class, the prof is BRILLIANT! Really opened my eyes to current issues in education. Had a alot of interest/experience in the class. Fair marker, really cares about his students. HIGHLY recommend!
